media.headline: Weaver K's Forsythe
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Weaver gets his first strikeout with Padres
media.bigblurb: Jered Weaver gets Logan Forsythe to look at a called third strike to pick up his first strikeout as a member of the Padres

media.headline: Puig's monster two-run home run
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Puig launches a two-run homer to left field
media.bigblurb: Yasiel Puig crushes a two-run home run to left field to give the Dodgers a 2-0 lead in the bottom of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Puig's second two-run homer
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Puig cranks second two-run homer of the game
media.bigblurb: Yasiel Puig drills his second two-run home run of the game, extending the Dodgers' lead to 4-0 in the bottom of the 4th inning

media.headline: Myers' two-run home run
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Myers belts an opposite-field two-run homer
media.bigblurb: Wil Myers hits a two-run home run to right-center field to cut the Padres' deficit in half in the top of the 6th inning

media.headline: Hernandez's RBI double
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Hernandez doubles to the gap, scores Barnes
media.bigblurb: Enrique Hernandez hits a line drive to the left-center-field gap to score Austin Barnes and give the Dodgers a 5-2 lead

media.headline: Hernandez scores, call stands
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Hernandez swipes home after the call stands
media.bigblurb: Enrique Hernandez is called safe at home on a double steal, and after the Padres challenge the call stands

media.headline: Seager's two-run double
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Seager plates two with a ground-rule double
media.bigblurb: Corey Seager flares one down the left-field line for a ground-rule double, extending the Dodgers' lead to 9-2 in the bottom of the 7th

media.headline: Hernandez scores on double steal
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Hernandez scores on double steal, call stands
media.bigblurb: Enrique Hernandez races home to score on a double steal, and the call stands after the Padres challenge

media.headline: Hand K's Pederson
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Hand strikes out Pederson swinging in 7th
media.bigblurb: Brad Hand gets Joc Pederson to strike out swinging to end the 7th inning

media.headline: Puig goes deep twice in win
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Puig drills two, two-run home runs vs. Padres
media.bigblurb: Yasiel Puig hammers a two-run home run in the bottom of the 2nd inning, then adds another two-run shot in the 4th vs. the Padres

media.headline: Gonzalez robs Margot of a hit
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Gonzalez makes a diving stop at first
media.bigblurb: Adrian Gonzalez makes a diving stop at first base to rob Manuel Margot of hit in the top of the 4th inning

media.headline: McCarthy strikes out four
media.blurb: SD@LAD: McCarthy fans four over six solid innings
media.bigblurb: Brandon McCarthy strikes out four batters over six innings of work, allowing four hits and one walk vs. the Padres

media.headline: Toles plates Puig with walk
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Toles plates Puig with bases-loaded walk
media.bigblurb: Andrew Toles works a walk with the bases loaded, allowing Yasiel Puig to score in the bottom of the 7th inning

media.headline: Stammen escapes bases-loaded jam
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Stammen K's Pederson with the bases loaded
media.bigblurb: Craig Stammen strikes out Joc Pederson with the bases loaded to end the 6th inning

media.headline: Forsythe's nifty play at third
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Forsythe makes a diving stop at third
media.bigblurb: Logan Forsythe dives to field a grounder, then gets back on his feet to make the throw to first to get Wil Myers out in the top of the 4th

media.headline: Toles scores on passed ball
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Toles scores on a passed ball in the 7th
media.bigblurb: Andrew Toles scores on a passed ball thrown by Brad Hand in the bottom of the 7th inning

media.headline: Green talks loss to the Dodgers
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Green on loss to Dodgers, bullpen issues
media.bigblurb: Padres manager Andy Green discusses their 10-2 loss to the Dodgers and missed pitches by the bullpen throughout the game

media.headline: Roberts on win over Padres
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Dave Roberts talks about Puig and McCarthy
media.bigblurb: Dodgers manager Dave Roberts talks about Yasiel Puig's two homers, Brandon McCarthy's outing and more after their 10-2 win over the Padres

media.headline: Recap: SD 2, LAD 10
media.blurb: 4/6/17: Puig hits two homers in win over the Padres
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Yasiel Puig hit two home runs while Brandon McCarthy went six innings and struck out four against the Padres to take the series

media.headline: Statcast: Puig's pair of homers
media.blurb: Statcast of the Day: Breaking down Puig's two homers
media.bigblurb: Statcast of the Day measures the exit velocity, launch angle and projected distance of Yasiel Puig's two home runs against the Padres

media.headline: Puig's two homers vs. Padres
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Puig shows off his power with pair of homers
media.bigblurb: Dodgers outfielder Yasiel Puig crushes two home runs against the Padres in Los Angeles

media.headline: 4/6/17 CG: SD@LAD
media.blurb: 4/6/17 Condensed Game: SD@LAD
media.bigblurb: 4/6/17 Condensed Game: SD@LAD

media.headline: McCarthy on his solid outing
media.blurb: Brandon McCarthy discusses his solid outing
media.bigblurb: Dodgers starter Brandon McCarthy talks about his outing against the Padres where he pitched six innings and struck out four

media.headline: Sanchez on concussion DL
media.blurb: SD@LAD: Sanchez placed on concussion disabled list
media.bigblurb: Hector Sanchez was placed on the seven-day concussion disabled list after he took a foul ball off his mask against the Dodgers
